mapper.select:
select id, menu_id, position, file_size, file_count, file_height, file_width, file_key, create_time, create_user, state, file_type, file_theme, bz, img_type, img_desc, img_quality, bak1, bak2, bak3 from sys_file_config where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and menu_id like '%${menuId}%'
and position like '%${position}%'
and file_size like '%${fileSize}%'
and file_count like '%${fileCount}%'
and file_height like '%${fileHeight}%'
and file_width like '%${fileWidth}%'
and file_key like '%${fileKey}%'
and create_time like '%${createTime}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and state like '%${state}%'
and file_type like '%${fileType}%'
and file_theme like '%${fileTheme}%'
and bz like '%${bz}%'
and img_type like '%${imgType}%'
and img_desc like '%${imgDesc}%'
and img_quality like '%${imgQuality}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
